question: Which among the following is correct statement?
option1: Cooperative Banks are fully controlled by RBI
option2: Cooperative Banks are partially controlled by RBI
option3: Cooperative Banks are Not controlled by RBI
option4: Cooperative Banks are fully controlled by Banking Regulation Act 194
answer: Cooperative Banks are partially controlled by RBI
explanation: The commercial banks are governed by banking regulation act 1949, but only some sections of this act apply to cooperative Banks. So RBI has partial control over cooperative banks
